name: unsplash
title: Unsplash
description: Search images or collections on Unsplash, download, copy or set them as wallpaper without leaving Raycast!
author: eggsy

commands.name: likes
commands.title: Liked Images
commands.subtitle: Unsplash
commands.description: View your liked images on Unsplash.

commands.name: random
commands.title: Set Random Wallpaper
commands.subtitle: Unsplash
commands.description: Set a random wallpaper from Unsplash.

preferences.name: accessKey
preferences.title: Access Key
preferences.description: Get your API key from https://unsplash.com/app/api

preferences.name: username
preferences.title: Username
preferences.description: Your username on Unsplash. Needed to list your lists.

preferences.name: gridItemSize
preferences.title: Grid Item Size
preferences.description: The size of the grid items.

preferences.name: showImageTitle
preferences.label: Show Image Title
preferences.description: Show the image title in the grid view.

preferences.name: orientation
preferences.title: Image Orientation
preferences.description: The orientation of images that will be displayed as result.

preferences.name: applyTo
preferences.title: Apply Wallpaper To
preferences.description: Set the wallpaper on all screens.

preferences.name: downloadSize
preferences.title: Default Download Size
preferences.description: The default size of the image to download. This might not be effective on every image, it will be applied where possible.

preferences.name: collections
preferences.title: Custom Collections
preferences.description: Leave blank for pre-selected ones - Collections to search for images on Set Random Wallpaper. Comma & space separated list of collection IDs.

preferences.name: includeDefaults
preferences.title: Include Default Collections
preferences.description: If you're using custom collections, select whether to include the default ones or not.
